titles: Epictetus his manuall. And Cebes his table. Out of the Greeke originall, by Io: Healey
author: Epictetus.
Cebes, of Thebes, attributed name.
Healey, John, d. 1610.
publisher: Printed [by G. Eld] for E. Blunt and W. Barret,
notes: A translation of "Enchiridion" by Epictetus, and the "Pinax" erroneously attributed to Cebes.
A variant of the 1610 edition with "Th. Thorpe" in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
